statement.subject: //sal:node[@type eq 'div'][$repeatIndex]/sal:citetrail/text()
statement.object: /(if($currentResource//sal:node[@type eq 'div'][$repeatIndex]/@subtype eq 'book') then 'part' else if ($currentResource//sal:node[@type eq 'div'][$repeatIndex]/@subtype eq 'chapter') then 'chapter' else 'section')

statement.subject: //sal:node[@type eq 'pb'][not(@subtype eq 'sameAs')][$repeatIndex]/sal:citetrail/text()
statement.object: /concat($currentResource/@work, if(functx:substring-before-last($currentResource//sal:node[@type eq 'pb'][not(@subtype eq 'sameAs')][$repeatIndex]/sal:citetrail, '.')) then ':' else (), functx:substring-before-last($currentResource//sal:node[@type eq 'pb'][not(@subtype eq 'sameAs')][$repeatIndex]/sal:citetrail, '.'))
